options.query:
SELECT p.*, summary.totalRecords 
FROM Products p,
(SELECT COUNT (1) totalRecords FROM Products p WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM Tenant_Access ta WHERE p.tenantId = ta.tenantId AND ta.email = '{{globals.currentUser.email}}')) as summary
WHERE 
EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM Tenant_Access ta WHERE p.tenantId = ta.tenantId AND ta.email = '{{globals.currentUser.email}}')
LIMIT 10 OFFSET {{components.table1.pageIndex}} * 10;

SELECT * , summary.totalRecords 
FROM Inventory i,
(SELECT COUNT (1) totalRecords FROM Inventory i WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM Tenant_Access ta WHERE i.tenantId = ta.tenantId AND ta.email = '{{globals.currentUser.email}}')) as summary
WHERE 
EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM Tenant_Access ta WHERE i.tenantId = ta.tenantId AND ta.email = '{{globals.currentUser.email}}')
LIMIT 10 OFFSET {{components.table1.pageIndex}} * 10;

SELECT REPLACE(fileName ,'/opt/transformations/', '') fileName,recordReadFromFile, recordAffected, CASE WHEN processed THEN 'Si' ELSE 'No' END processed, summary.totalRecords
FROM 
Files f,
(SELECT COUNT (1) totalRecords FROM Files f WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM Tenant_Access ta WHERE f.tenantId = ta.tenantId AND ta.email = '{{globals.currentUser.email}}')) as summary
WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM Tenant_Access ta WHERE f.tenantId = ta.tenantId AND ta.email = '{{globals.currentUser.email}}')
LIMIT 10 OFFSET {{components.table1.pageIndex}} * 10;

SELECT c.*, summary.totalRecords 
FROM 
Customers c,
(SELECT COUNT (1) totalRecords FROM Customers c WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM Tenant_Access ta WHERE c.tenantId = ta.tenantId AND ta.email = '{{globals.currentUser.email}}')) as summary
WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM Tenant_Access ta WHERE c.tenantId = ta.tenantId AND ta.email = '{{globals.currentUser.email}}')
LIMIT 10 OFFSET {{components.table1.pageIndex}} * 10;

SELECT * , summary.totalRecords 
FROM Sales_Invoice si,
(SELECT COUNT (1) totalRecords FROM Sales_Invoice si WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM Tenant_Access ta WHERE si.tenantId = ta.tenantId AND ta.email = '{{globals.currentUser.email}}')) as summary
WHERE 
EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM Tenant_Access ta WHERE si.tenantId = ta.tenantId AND ta.email = '{{globals.currentUser.email}}')
LIMIT 10 OFFSET {{components.table1.pageIndex}} * 10;
